title: "Impact of homelessness on surgical outcomes"
output: html_notebook

# Env set-up

```{r}
# load libraries
library(googlesheets4)
library(googledrive)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)

# authenticate with google drive
drive_auth()
```

# Data load, clean and feature engineering

```{r}
domiciled <- drive_get("Homeless Data") %>%
  read_sheet(range = "Domiciled") %>%
  mutate(status = "domiciled") %>%
  clean_names()

homeless <- drive_get("Homeless Data") %>%
  read_sheet(range = "Homeless") %>%
  mutate(status = "homeless") %>%
  clean_names()

data <- bind_rows(domiciled, homeless)

skim(data)
```
